meanings.definition: A chemical compound used as a urinary antiseptic.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed methenamines to treat the urinary infection.
meanings.sent2: She bought methenamines from the pharmacy to help with her UTI.
meanings.sent3: The methenamines danced around in the bladder, fighting off the bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The methenamines acted like tiny soldiers, protecting the urinary system.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of the methenamines made them easy to spot in the urine sample.

meanings.definition: A derivative of ammonia used in the treatment of urinary tract infections.
meanings.sent1: The nurse administered methenamines to the patient to combat the UTI.
meanings.sent2: Methenamines are effective in clearing up urinary infections.
meanings.sent3: The methenamines threw a party in the bladder, celebrating their victory over the infection.
meanings.sent4: The methenamines worked tirelessly like little cleaners, sweeping away the bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The powerful scent of the methenamines filled the room during the treatment.
